title-group.article-title: A NEW ALGORITHM TO SEARCH FOR SMALL NONZERO |x³ - y²| VALUES

abstract.p: In relation to Hall's conjecture, a new algorithm is presented to search for small nonzero k = |x³ — y²| values. Seventeen new values of Kx½ are reported.
